crowd42's blog

char nick[7] = "crowd42";

printf("https://github.com/%s\n",nick);

printf("https://mastodon.social/%s\n",nick);

printf("https://keybase.io/%s\n",nick);

printf("https://twitter.com/%s\n",nick);

printf("%s\x40riseup\x2e\\\bnet\n",nick);

puts("0xdc 5a6d b445 976d 60");
